name: RHYTHM BEAT LIGHTSABER
description:
RHYTHM BEAT LIGHTSABER is a unique arcade game where your goal is to slash the cubes as they are coming at you. They perfectly match the rhythm of the music. You have two lightsabers so you have to listen both sides. In addition every cube indicates the direction you need to match. Watch out for the densely direction changing ones!


Features:

• Level selection
• Amazing sound and visual effects
• Game accessibility for everyone
• Dynamic movements
